messages.title: Straight talking.
messages.content: As your UKIP candidate for Sleaford and North Hykeham I offer this: an opportunity to change the face of our country's corrupt politics.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Let's end the grip of the Lib/Lab/Con on power and take Britain out of the EU.
The EU controls our borders and while David Miliband, William Hague and the Lib Dems are backing Turkish membership of the EU, UKIP would freeze immigration for five years.
We need to rid ourselves of politicians who are corrupt and self-serving. We've seen this clearly in the abuse of parliamentary expenses.

issues.brexitEurope: Take Britain out of the EU.
issues.economy: The EU controls job creation, business regulation and costs us £45 million a day.
issues.environment: Meanwhile, because the UK Government no longer controls our environmental policy, an energy crisis looms over the EU gives us 10,000 pointless windmills to blight our local landscapes.
issues.governance: We need to rid ourselves of politicians who are corrupt and self-serving.
issues.immigration: The EU controls our borders and while David Miliband, William Hague and the Lib Dems are backing Turkish membership of the EU, UKIP would freeze immigration for five years.

leaflet.personalStatement: I offer this: an opportunity to change the face of our country's corrupt politics.

contactInformation.address: UK Independence Party, PO Box 408, Newton Abbot TQ12 9BG
